segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I have reserved a table for 2 at 7:30 . My name is Bob .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . Is there anything wrong ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three of our friends will join us so can you seat 5 people at that time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , sir . We will arrange you a table for 5 .
segments.speaker: S1
